verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> the sum בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons קְהָ֔ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3881><s%> Leviite לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> by the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> From thirty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> even until fifty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> all that enter לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> into the host לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> the work בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> This [shall be] the service בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [about] the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> holy things

וּבָ֨א <S%H935><s%> shall come אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> setteth forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> And when the camp וְהוֹרִ֕דוּ <S%H3381><s%> and they shall take down אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פָּרֹ֣כֶת <S%H6532><s%> vail הַמָּסָ֑ךְ <S%H4539><s%> the covering וְכִ֨סּוּ־ <S%H3680><s%> and cover בָ֔הּ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲרֹ֥ן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> of testimony

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> And shall put עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and כְּסוּי֙ <S%H3681><s%> thereon the covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תַּ֔חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וּפָרְשׂ֧וּ <S%H6566><s%> and shall spread בֶֽגֶד־ <S%H899><s%> [it] a cloth כְּלִ֛יל <S%H3632><s%> wholly תְּכֵ֖לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> over וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> and shall put בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> in the staves

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Over שֻׁלְחַ֣ן <S%H7979><s%> And upon the table הַפָּנִ֗ים <S%H6440><s%> of shewbread יִפְרְשׂוּ֮ <S%H6566><s%> they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> a cloth תְּכֵלֶת֒ <S%H8504><s%> of blue וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put עָ֠לָיו <S%H5921><s%> Over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּעָרֹ֤ת <S%H7086><s%> thereon the dishes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּת֙ <S%H3709><s%> and the spoons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנַקִּיֹּ֔ת <S%H4518><s%> and the bowls וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> קְשׂ֣וֹת <S%H7184><s%> and covers הַנָּ֑סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> to cover withal וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> and the continual עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> Over יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> And they shall spread עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> over בֶּ֚גֶד <S%H899><s%> upon them a cloth תּוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> of scarlet וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> and cover אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> the same with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> in the staves

וְלָקְח֣וּ ׀ <S%H3947><s%> And they shall take בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> a cloth תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue וְכִסּ֞וּ <S%H3680><s%> and cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְנֹרַ֤ת <S%H4501><s%> the candlestick הַמָּאוֹר֙ <S%H3974><s%> of the light וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֵ֣רֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5216><s%> and his lamps וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְקָחֶ֖יהָ <S%H4457><s%> and his tongs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחְתֹּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H4289><s%> and his snuffdishes וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessels שַׁמְנָ֔הּ <S%H8081><s%> and all the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְשָׁרְתוּ־ <S%H8334><s%> thereof wherewith they minister לָ֖הּ בָּהֶֽם׃

וְנָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they shall put אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלֶ֔יהָ <S%H3627><s%> it and all the vessels אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> thereof within a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4132><s%> [it] upon a bar

וְעַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Over מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> And upon the golden יִפְרְשׂוּ֙ <S%H6566><s%> they shall spread בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> and cover אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> it with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֖וּ <S%H7760><s%> and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> to the staves

וְלָקְחוּ֩ <S%H3947><s%> And they shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> all the instruments הַשָּׁרֵ֜ת <S%H8335><s%> of ministry אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which יְשָֽׁרְתוּ־ <S%H8334><s%> wherewith they minister בָ֣ם בַּקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the sanctuary וְנָֽתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> [them] in a cloth תְּכֵ֔לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue וְכִסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> and cover אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בְּמִכְסֵ֖ה <S%H4372><s%> them with a covering ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תָּ֑חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וְנָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4132><s%> [them] on a bar

וְדִשְּׁנ֖וּ <S%H1878><s%> And they shall take away the ashes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> from the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> and spread עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> over בֶּ֖גֶד <S%H899><s%> cloth אַרְגָּמָֽן׃ <S%H713><s%> a purple

וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they shall put עָ֠לָיו <S%H5921><s%> connection אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֞יו <S%H3627><s%> upon it all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְֽשָׁרְת֧וּ <S%H8334><s%> thereof wherewith they minister עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> over בָּהֶ֗ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּחְתֹּ֤ת <S%H4289><s%> about it [even] the censers אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְלָגֹת֙ <S%H4207><s%> the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּעִ֣ים <S%H3257><s%> and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <S%H4219><s%> and the basons כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וּפָרְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6566><s%> and they shall spread עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> over כְּס֛וּי <S%H3681><s%> upon it a covering ע֥וֹר <S%H5785><s%> skins תַּ֖חַשׁ <S%H8476><s%> of badgers' וְשָׂמ֥וּ <S%H7760><s%> and put בַדָּֽיו׃ <S%H905><s%> to the staves

וְכִלָּ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> have made an end אַֽהֲרֹן־ <S%H175><s%> And when Aaron וּ֠בָנָיו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons לְכַסֹּ֨ת <S%H3680><s%> of covering אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the sanctuary וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> and all the vessels הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary בִּנְסֹ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> is to set forward הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <S%H4264><s%> as the camp וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the sons קְהָת֙ <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath לָשֵׂ֔את <S%H5375><s%> to bear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִגְּע֥וּ <S%H5060><s%> [it] but they shall not touch אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [any] holy thing וָמֵ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> lest they die אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> These [things are] the burden בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath בְּאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וּפְקֻדַּ֞ת <S%H6486><s%> And to the office אֶלְעָזָ֣ר ׀ <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest שֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> [pertaineth] the oil הַמָּאוֹר֙ <S%H3974><s%> for the light וּקְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense הַסַּמִּ֔ים <S%H5561><s%> and the sweet וּמִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> meat offering הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> and the daily וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <S%H4888><s%> and the anointing פְּקֻדַּ֗ת <S%H6486><s%> [and] the oversight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <S%H4908><s%> of all the tabernacle וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֔וֹ בְּקֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and of all that therein [is] in the sanctuary וּבְכֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H3627><s%> and in the vessels ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּכְרִ֕יתוּ <S%H3772><s%> Cut ye not off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe מִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> of the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites

וְזֹ֣את ׀ <S%H2063><s%> But עֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> But thus do לָהֶ֗ם וְחָיוּ֙ <S%H2421><s%> unto them that they may live וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יָמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> and not die בְּגִשְׁתָּ֖ם <S%H5066><s%> when they approach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> unto the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy things אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons יָבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall go in וְשָׂמ֣וּ <S%H7760><s%> and appoint אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> them every אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of עֲבֹדָת֖וֹ <S%H5656><s%> to his service וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מַשָּׂאֽוֹ׃ <S%H4853><s%> and to his burden

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> But they shall not go in לִרְא֛וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see כְּבַלַּ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> are covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> when the holy things וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> lest they die פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נָשֹׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> also the sum בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> throughout the houses אֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> by their families
